data.name: BlobSizeReductonError
data.value: Cannot change size below currently written size

data.name: BlobSizeTypeMismatch
data.value: A stream blob must have a blob size of 0.

data.name: BlobTooLargeError
data.value: The blob is larger than maximum supported size '{0}'

data.name: BlocksExistError
data.value: Data already uploaded

data.name: BlockTooLargeError
data.value: Block size can not be larger than '{0}'

data.name: ConditionalRequiresDateTime
data.value: If-Modified-Since and If-Unmodified-Since require a DateTime value.

data.name: ConditionalRequiresETag
data.value: If-Match and If-None-Match require an ETag value.

data.name: MD5MismatchError
data.value: Calculated MD5 does not match existing property

data.name: UndefinedBlobType
data.value: The blob type cannot be undefined.

data.name: BlocksTooSmallError
data.value: The block size must be positive value

data.name: ArgumentEmptyError
data.value: The argument must not be empty string.

data.name: MissingContainerInformation
data.value: Invalid blob address '{0}', missing container information

data.name: ArgumentOutOfRangeError
data.value: The argument is out of range

data.name: ArgumentTooLargeError
data.value: The argument '{0}' is larger than maximum of '{1}'

data.name: ArgumentTooSmallError
data.value: The argument '{0}' is smaller than minimum of '{1}'

data.name: SeekTooFarError
data.value: Attempting to seek past the end of the stream

data.name: SeekTooLowError
data.value: Attempting to seek before the start of the stream

data.name: RelativeAddressNotPermitted
data.value: Address '{0}' is not an absolute address. Relative addresses are not permitted in here.

data.name: TooManyBlocksError
data.value: The number of blocks is larger than the maximum of '{0}'

data.name: NoMoreResultsForSegmentCursor
data.value: The segment cursor has no more results.

data.name: TableNameInvalid
data.value: '{0}' is not a valid table name.

data.name: AttachToTableServiceContext
data.value: Cannot attach to a TableStorageDataServiceContext object. These objects already contain the functionality for accessing the table storage service.

data.name: CannotCreateSASWithoutAccountKey
data.value: Cannot create Shared Access Signature unless the Account Key credentials are used by the BlobServiceClient.

data.name: CannotModifySnapshot
data.value: Cannot perform this operation on a blob representing a snapshot.

data.name: InvalidQueryParametersInsideBlobAddress
data.value: Invalid query parameters inside Blob address '{0}'.

data.name: MissingMandatoryParamtersForSAS
data.value: Missing mandatory parameters for valid Shared Access Signature

data.name: MultipleCredentialsProvided
data.value: Cannot provide credentials as part of the address and as constructor parameter. Either pass in the address or use a different constructor.

data.name: MultipleSnapshotTimesProvided
data.value: Multiple different snapshot times provided as part of query '{0}' and as constructor parameter '{1}'.

data.name: TooManyPolicyIdentifiers
data.value: Too many '{0}' shared access policy identifiers provided. Server does not support setting more than '{1}' on a single container.

data.name: MessageTooLarge
data.value: Messages cannot be larger than {0} bytes.

data.name: InvalidAclType
data.value: Invalid acl public access type returned '{0}'. Expected blob or container.

data.name: IncompatibleAddressesProvided
data.value: Cannot combine incompatible absolute Uris base '{0}' relative '{1}'.When trying to combine 2 absolute Uris, the base uri should be a valid base of the relative Uri.

data.name: MissingAccountInformationInUri
data.value: Cannot find account information inside Uri '{0}'

data.name: PathStyleUriMissingAccountNameInformation
data.value: Missing account name information inside path style uri. Path style uris should be of the form http://<IPAddressPlusPort>/<accountName>

data.name: CannotCreateSASSignatureForGivenCred
data.value: Cannot create Shared Access Signature as the credentials does not have account name information. Please check that the credentials used support creating Shared Access Signature.

data.name: ClientSideTimeoutError
data.value: Server operation did not finish within user specified timeout '{0}' seconds, check if operation is valid or try increasing the timeout.

data.name: MustCallEndMoveNextSegmentFirst
data.value: EndMoveNextSegment must be called before the Current property can be accessed.

data.name: BlobQSharedKeyLiteUnsuppported
data.value: "Versions before 2009-09-19 do not support Shared Key Lite for Blob And Queue, current target version '{0}'"

data.name: MissingXmsDateInHeader
data.value: Canonicalization did not find a non empty x-ms-date header in the WebRequest. Please use a WebRequest with a valid x-ms-date header in RFC 123 format (example request.Headers["x-ms-date"] = DateTime.UtcNow.ToString("R", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))

data.name: NotSupportedForPageBlob
data.value: This operation is not supported for creating a PageBlob. Use other operations to create a PageBlob.

data.name: DeleteSnapshotsNotValidError
data.value: The option '{0}' must be 'None' to delete a specific snapshot specified by '{1}'

data.name: CredentialsCantSignRequest
data.value: The supplied credentials '{0'} cannot be used to sign request

data.name: CannotCreateSASForSnapshot
data.value: Cannot create Shared Access Signature for snapshots. Perform the operation on the root blob instead.

data.name: ConditionNotMatchedError
data.value: The conditionals specified for this operation did not match server.

data.name: ConfigurationSettingPublisherError
data.value: SetConfigurationSettingPublisher needs to be called before FromConfigurationSetting can be used

data.name: ListSnapshotsWithDelimiterError
data.value: Listing snapshots is only supported in flat mode (no delimiter). Consider setting BlobRequestOptions.UseFlatBlobListing property to true.

data.name: ServerReturnedMoreThanMaxResults
data.value: Server returned more that MaxResults requested

data.name: InvalidContinuationType
data.value: The continuation type passed in is unexpected. Please verify that the correct continuation type is passed in. Expected {0}, found {1}

data.name: BlobTypeMismatchExceptionMessage
data.value: BlobType of the blob reference doesn't match BlobType of the blob.

data.name: BinaryMessageShouldUseBase64Encoding
data.value: EncodeMessage should be true for binary message.

data.name: CannotRetryNonSeekableStreamError
data.value: Cannot retry operation using a source stream which does not support seek. To avoid this exception set the RetryPolicy to NoRetry or use a seekable stream.

data.name: SnapshotTimePassedTwice
data.value: Snapshot query parameter is already defined in the blobUri. Either pass in a snapshotTime parameter or use a full URL with a snapshot query parameter.
